name: Blood of Akret
description:
Restless gods are waiting for a champion. It is said that only souls lost in the sea of sand can find the way to the forsaken land of Akret and spill the blood of the dead. 

Blood of Akret is an arena action FPS where you must fight and survive against waves of increasingly numerous and powerful enemies. Gear up with weapons and magical power to rival the gods in Akret!

W,A,S,D - Move
Space - Jump
Left click - Shoot
R - Reload
1,2,3 - Switch weapon
Escape - Pause

Uses FMOD and UFPS.

Uses content from freepik.com :  www.freepik.com
